body:
Ran into the same issue while playing around and breaking things in the tutorial/book. I realize the code below doesn't and shouldn't work, but figured the compiler crash was worth reporting.

```
fn main() {
    let ten = Character::Digit(10);
    println!("The character is {}", ten.Digit);
}

enum Character {
    Digit(i32),
    Other,
}
```

## Meta

rustc 1.0.0-nightly (809a554fc 2015-03-23) (built 2015-03-23)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 809a554fca2d0ebc2ba50077016fe282a4064752
commit-date: 2015-03-23
build-date: 2015-03-23
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.0.0-nightly

Backtrace:

```

                                                  ^~~~~~~~~
```
